import React from "react"; function PizzaBlock({title, price, image, sizes, types}) { const [avtiveType, setActiveType] = React.useState(0); const typeNames = ['тонкое', 'традиционное']; return (

{title}

    { types.map((typeId, i) => (
  • {typeNames[typeId]}
    • )) }
    { sizes.map((size) =>
  • {size} см.
    • ) }
от {price} ₴
); } export default PizzaBlock;
